SEARCH

Package org.example.crmedu.domain.service

package org.example.crmedu.domain.service
This package contains service interfaces and their implementations responsible for handling business logic and interacting with repositories.

The organization, schedule, student, subject, tutor, and user packages contain services that implement the core business logic for each respective entity. These services interact with the corresponding repositories to perform CRUD operations and enforce business rules.

The jwt and auth packages contain services that are the rules that needed to implemented for work with authentication. jwt package provides security utilities, auth includes authentication-related services.

The BaseCrudService interface contains methods for implement CRUD-operations.
